This document belongs to <nowiki>[[..-DetailedProcess#The_stages|Manual Full System Encryption (with Extras): Detailed Process]]</nowiki>.

== Explanation ==

At this point, the terminal application has been running, the Installer has run, and you have installed Ubuntu.

But.

There will be errors. This section deals with fixing the errors.

== Complete the terminal application. ==

Return to the terminal. If it does not realise that the Installer has finished, you will have to press `Enter` (as instructed on the terminal).

Follow the remaining instructions.

== Continue ==

When the terminal application tells you that everything is complete, you may close all open windows including the terminal.

Make a note of this page, reboot your computer, return to the <nowiki>[[..-DetailedProcess#The_stages|Detailed Process]]</nowiki> and continue from there.

----
